tableClientInPurpose.noClientsAssociatedToPurposeLabel: No clients associated with this purpose

create.title: Create new client
create.description: After creating a new client, you will always be able to add and remove security operators and public keys to access the Providers e-services

nameField.label: Client name (required)
nameField.infoLabel: It will help you tell them apart. Min 5 chars, max 60 chars

clientOperatorsSection.title: Security operators
clientOperatorsSection.description: You can manage the security operators in every moment, still after the creation

addOperatorsDrawer.title: Add security operators
addOperatorsDrawer.adminAlert: If you plan on uploading public keys for this client, add yourself as a member of this client, too

addPublicKeyDrawer.title: Insert new public key
addPublicKeyDrawer.description: Don't know how to create a set of cryptographic material? <1>Check the guide</1>.

nameInput.label: Key name (required)
nameInput.infoLabel: It will help you tell them apart. Min. 5 characters, max. 60 characters

tabs.ariaLabel: Three different tabs with the instructions to obtain a voucher, for client members and public keys
tabs.voucher: How do I obtain a voucher?
